items.trigger: Approval of budget / debt / issuance of securities

evidence.quote: Sont soumises à l'accord préalable des Investisseurs : émission de titres, endettement au-delà de 1 000 000€, modification statutaire.

items.effect: Restricts transfers or grants ROFR/approval right

evidence.quote: Any transfer of Shares is subject to a right of first refusal (ROFR) in favor of the Investors, exercisable within 20 Business Days.

items.effect: Forces or enables sale participation under conditions

evidence.quote: Holders representing at least 70% of the voting rights may require all shareholders to sell their Shares in a Sale of the Company (drag-along).

items.trigger: Down round / issuance below prior price
items.effect: Adjusts conversion price or economic terms

evidence.quote: An adjustment mechanism may apply to certain subscription warrants (ratchet) if new securities are issued at a lower price, subject to conditions. Les modalités sont
